verses.verse: A Psalm of David<WH1732>. Unto thee will I cry<WH7121>, O LORD<WH3068> my rock<WH6697>; be not silent<WH2814> to me: lest, if thou be silent<WH2790> to me, I become<WH4911> like them that go down<WH3381> into the pit<WH953>.
Hear<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of my supplications<WH8469>, when I cry<WH7768> unto thee, when I lift up<WH5375> my hands<WH3027> toward thy holy<WH6944> oracle<WH1687>.

Draw me not away<WH4900> with the wicked<WH7563>, and with the workers<WH6466> of iniquity<WH205>, which speak<WH1696> peace<WH7965> to their neighbours<WH7453>, but mischief<WH7451> is in their hearts<WH3824>.

Give<WH5414> them according to their deeds<WH6467>, and according to the wickedness<WH7455> of their endeavours<WH4611>: give<WH5414> them after the work<WH4639> of their hands<WH3027>; render<WH7725> to them their desert<WH1576>.
Because they regard<WH995> not the works<WH6468> of the LORD<WH3068>, nor the operation<WH4639> of his hands<WH3027>, he shall destroy<WH2040> them, and not build them up<WH1129>.
Blessed<WH1288> be the LORD<WH3068>, because he hath heard<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of my supplications<WH8469>.

The LORD<WH3068> is my strength<WH5797> and my shield<WH4043>; my heart<WH3820> trusted<WH982> in him, and I am helped<WH5826>: therefore my heart<WH3820> greatly rejoiceth<WH5937>; and with my song<WH7892> will I praise<WH3034> him.
The LORD<WH3068> is their strength<WH5797>, and he is the saving<WH3444> strength<WH4581> of his anointed<WH4899>.
Save<WH3467> thy people<WH5971>, and bless<WH1288> thine inheritance<WH5159>: feed<WH7462> them also, and lift them up<WH5375> for ever<WH5769>.
